name: Accelerate
effect: Pay 3 Force -> Each of your units gets +10 speed until end of turn.

name: Alien Rage
effect: Pay 5 Force -> One of your units gets +20 speed, +2 power, and Critical Hit 2 until end of turn.

name: Artoo's Repairs
effect: Pay 3 Force -> Prevent up to 2 damage to one of your Space or Ground units and remove up to 2 damage counters from that unit. Play only if you have a Droid in any arena.

name: Blast It!
effect: One of your Space units gets "Pay 1 Force -> Retaliate 3" until end of turn. (If a unit is attacking a retaliating unit in the same arena, the retaliating unit does 3 dice of damage to that unit when the attack ends.)

name: Blow This Thing
effect: Pay 8 Force -> For this attack, roll only 1 of your dice instead of a number of dice equal to the attacking unit's power. If the attacking unit damages the defending unit, the defending unit is discarded. Play only if one of your units is attacking.

name: C-3PO (D)
effect: Put 1 damage counter on C-3PO -> Remove 1 damage counter from one of your other Droids. Play only during your build step.

name: Celebrate the Victory
effect: Draw 5 cards. You can complete Celebrate the Victory only if your opponent has no units in the Space arena and no Space units in his or her build zone.

name: Chariot Light Assault Vehicle
effect: Tap -> One of your units in the Ground arena gets Accuracy 1 for this attack (add +1 to each of that unit's attack dice). Play only when that unit is attacking.

name: Chewbacca (A)
effect:
Pay 1 Force -> Intercept (If a unit in attacking one of your Characters in the same arena as Chewbacca, it now attacks Chewbacca instead.)
Pay 3 Force -> Retaliate 6 (If a unit in the same arena as Chewbacca is attacking him, he does 6 dice of damage to that unit when the attack ends.)

name: Chewbacca (B)
effect:
When you draw a card, if Chewbacca is in the Character arena, remove 1 damage counter from one of your Space or Ground units.
Pay 1 Force -> Retaliate 2 (If a unit in the same arena as Chewbacca is attacking him, he does 2 dice of damage to that unit when the attack ends.)

name: Chewbacca (C)
effect:
Pay 2 Force -> Retaliate 4 (If a unit in the same arena as Chewbacca is attacking him, he does 4 dice of damage to that unit when the attack ends.)
Transport Pilot. The Transport gets +2 power.

name: Chewbacca (D)
effect: Pay 2 Force -> Retaliate 4 (If a unit in the same arena as Chewbacca is attacking him, he does 4 dice of damage to that unit when the attack ends.)

name: Chief Bast (A)
effect: Tap -> Look at your opponent's hand. Play only during your build step.

name: Colonel Wullf Yularen (A)
effect: When the roll for build points is made, if Yularen is in the Character arena and your opponent doesn't have at least one unit in each arena, you get +1 build point this turn.

name: Commander Willard (A)
effect: As long as Willard is in the Character arena, each of your Starfighters gets Shields 1.

name: Corellian Corvette
effect: Tap -> You get +1 build point this turn. Play only during your build step.

name: Countermeasures
effect: Pay 4 Force -> For this attack, when the attacking unit damages the defending unit, it also does that much damage to itself.

name: Creature Attack
effect: When the battle phase starts, your opponent chooses one of his or her units in the Character arena. Creature Attack does 5 dice of damage to that unit.

name: Darth Vader (D)
effect:
Pay 3 Force -> Evade 3
Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets:
* +20 speed.
* +2 power.
* Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2.

name: Darth Vader (E)
effect:
As long as Vader is in the Character arena, each of your Stormtroopers gets +1 power.
Pay 4 Force -> Evade 4
Pay 2 Force -> Retaliate 4 (If a unit in the same arena as Vader is attacking him, he does 4 dice of damage to that unit when the attack ends.)

name: Darth Vader (F)
effect:
Tap, Pay 4 Force -> Choose one of your opponent's Characters with health 3 or less in the Character arena. Your opponent discards that Character. Play only when Vader would attack.
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 1

name: Death Star (A)
effect:
Each Starfighter gets Critical Hit 3 as long as it's attacking the Death Star.
Bombard 8 (The Death Star may attack a unit in the Ground arena instead of a unit in the Space arena, using 8 power plus any other effects.)

name: Death Star (B)
effect:
Each Starfighter gets Critical Hit 3 as long as it's attacking the Death Star.
Pay 1 build point -> Search your deck. You may take an Imperial Starfighter card from your deck. Show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. Play only during your build step and only once per turn.

name: Death Star (C)
effect:
Each Starfighter gets Critical Hit 3 as long as it's attacking the Death Star.
Tap -> Each player discards all of his or her units in the Ground arena. Play only if your opponent has no units in the Space arena and only when the Death Star would attack.

name: Death Star Trooper
effect: As long as the Death Star is in the Space arena, this unit gets +2 power.

name: Death Star Turbolaser Tower
effect: Ion Cannon 5 (This unit may attack a unit in the Space arena instead of a unit in the Ground arena, using 5 power plus any other effects.)

name: Deflectors Activated
effect: Choose an arena. This turn, when any of your units in that arena would be damaged, prevent 1 of that damage.

name: Escape Pod
effect: As long as this unit is in the Space arena, if one of your Space units with a Pilot on it is discarded, you may move that Pilot to your build zone instead of discarding it. If you do, discard this unit from the Space arena.

name: Garven Dreis (A)
effect: Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets: "Pay 2 Force -> This Starfighter gets +2 power for this attack."

name: Grand Moff Tarkin (A)
effect:
When the roll for build points is made, if Tarkin is in the Character arena, you get +1 build point this turn.
As long as Tarkin is in the Character arena, each of your Jedi gets "Pay 1 Force -> Retaliate 4 (If a unit in the same arena as this unit is attacking this unit, this unit does 4 dice of damage to that unit when the attack ends)."

name: Grand Moff Tarkin (B)
effect: When the Character battle step starts, if Tarkin is in the Character arena, you may remove up to 5 damage counters from one of your damaged Battle Stations.

name: Grand Moff Tarkin (C)
effect: As long as Tarkin is in the Character arena, you can't retreat your units during your retreat step.

name: Greedo's Marksmanship
effect: Pay 4 Force -> Prevent all damage to one of your Characters.

name: Han Solo (A)
effect:
As long as Han is in the Character arena, draw 1 extra card during your draw step.
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of Han's attack dice.)

name: Han Solo (B)
effect:
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of Han's attack dice.)
Transport Pilot. The Transport gets:
* +10 speed.
* Accuracy 1.

name: Han Solo (C)
effect:
When the roll for build points is made, if Han is in the Character arena, you get -1 build point this turn.
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of Han's attack dice.)

name: Han Solo (D)
effect: Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of Han's attack dice.)

name: Han's Evasion
effect: Pay 4 Force -> Prevent all damage to one of your Space units.

name: Heavy Fire Zone
effect: Pay 8 Force -> Choose an arena. Each of your units in that arena gets Critical Hit 2 until end of turn.

name: Hero's Potential
effect: Pay 4 Force -> Choose one of your stacked unique units. Take any card in that stack and put it on top. When the turn ends, put that card on the bottom of the stack.

name: Imperial Dewback
effect:
This unit gets +4 power as long as it's attacking a neutral unit.
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of this unit's attack dice.)

name: Imperial Landing Craft
effect: When you deploy this unit, choose one of your opponent's Ground units. If that unit is in the Ground arena when the battle phase starts, this unit does 2 damage to it.

name: Interrogation Droid
effect: Tap, Discard this unit from the Character arena -> Look at your opponent's hand. If your opponent has any Battle or Mission cards there, choose one of them. Your opponent discards that card. Play only when this unit would attack.

name: Jawa Crawler
effect: Tap -> Draw 2 cards, then discard 3 cards from your hand. Play only during your build step.

name: Jawa Scavenger
effect: When this unit damages one of your opponent's Droids, your opponent puts that Droid on top of his or her deck.

name: Jek Porkins (A)
effect: Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets: "Pay 1 Force -> Retaliate 2 (If a unit in the same arena as this Starfighter is attacking this Starfighter, this Starfighter does 2 dice of damage to that unit when the attack ends.)"

name: Labria (A)
effect: As long as Labria is in the Character arena, your opponent plays with his or her hand face up.

name: Let the Wookiee Win
effect: Choose an arena. Until end of turn, each of your units in that arena gets "Pay 2 Force -> Retaliate 2 (If a unit in the same arena as this unit is attacking this unit, this unit does 2 dice of damage to that unit when the attack ends.)"

name: Lieutenant Shann Childsen (A)
effect: Tap -> Choose an untapped, non-Jedi Character. Tap that Character. Play only when Childsen would attack.

name: Luke Skywalker (E)
effect:
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2
Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets:
* Critical Hit 4.
* Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2.

name: Luke Skywalker (F)
effect:
Pay 1 Force -> Evade 1
Pay 1 Force -> Retaliate 2 (If a unit in the same arena as Luke is attacking him, he does 2 dice of damage to that unit when the attack ends.)

name: Luke Skywalker (G)
effect:
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 1
Transport Pilot. The Transport gets Critical Hit 2.

name: Luke's Skyhopper (A)
effect:
When the battle phase starts, if Luke's Skyhopper is in the Ground arena and has a Pilot on it, you gain +1 Force.
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of Luke's Skyhopper's attack dice.)

name: Luke's Speeder (B)
effect: Tap -> Show a face-down Character card in your build zone to your opponent. Put a build counter on that card. Play only during your build step.

name: Luke's X-wing (B)
effect:
Critical Hit 4
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2

name: Malfunction
effect: Pay 2 Force -> Choose one of your opponent's Droids in any arena. Malfunction does 6 dice of damage to that unit. Play only when no unit is attacking.

name: Millennium Falcon (A)
effect:
The Millennium Falcon can have an extra Pilot.
Shields 1
Pay any number of build points -> Remove that many damage counters from the Millennium Falcon. Play only during your build step.

name: Millennium Falcon (B)
effect:
The Millennium Falcon can have an extra Pilot.
When the battle phase starts, if the Millennium Falcon has a Pilot on it, you may remove 1 damage counter from the Millennium Falcon.
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2

name: Millennium Falcon (C)
effect:
The Millennium Falcon can have an extra pilot.
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of the Millennium Falcon's attack dice.)
Shields 1

name: Mobile Command Base
effect:
As long as this unit is in the Ground arena, each of your Imperial Characters gets Stun 2 (when one of those Characters damages another unit, that unit gets -2 power until end of turn.)
Shields 1

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi (H)
effect:
When Obi-Wan is discarded from the Character arena, you may search your deck. You may take a Luke Skywalker card from your deck and stack it under a Luke Skywalker in the Character arena. (Follow normal stacking rules.) Then shuffle your deck.
Pay 2 Force -> Evade 2

name: Obi-Wan's Guidance
effect: Pay 4 Force -> One of your units in the Character arena or one of your units with a Pilot on it gets Accuracy 2 until end of turn (add +2 to each of that unit's attack dice).

name: Obi-Wan's Handiwork
effect: Pay 5 Force -> Non-Jedi Characters can't attack this turn. Play only before any unit in the Character arena attacks.

name: Outrun
effect: Pay 3 Force -> Prevent up to 3 damage to one of your units in the Space arena. Retreat that unit.

name: Pilot's Speed
effect: Pay 1 Force -> One of your units in the Space or Ground arena gets +40 speed until end of turn.

name: Princess Leia (D)
effect:
When the roll for build points is made, if Leia is in the Character arena, you get +1 build point this turn.
When one of your opponent's Characters would damage Leia, prevent that damage unless your opponent pays 2 Force.

name: Princess Leia (E)
effect:
Discard Leia from the Character arena -> Search your deck. You may take a Jedi card from your deck. Show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. Play only during your build step.
Discard one of your Jedi from the Character arena -> Return Leia to your hand. Play only during your build step and only if Leia is in your discard pile.

name: R2-D2 (D)
effect:
Any Starfighter with R2-D2 on it can have an extra Pilot if that Pilot isn't an Astromech Droid.
Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets:
* +10 speed.
* Critical Hit 2.
* When the battle phase ends, remove 1 damage counter from this Starfighter.

name: R2-Q5 (A)
effect: Tap -> You get +1 build point this turn unless your opponent pays 4 Force. Play only during your build step.

name: R2-X2 (A)
effect:
Any Starfighter with R2-X2 on it can have an extra Pilot if that Pilot isn't an Astromech Droid.
Starfighter Pilot. The Starfighter gets +1 power.

name: Rebel Armored Freerunner
effect: Tap -> This unit does 3 damage divided as you choose between 1 or 2 of your opponent's units in the Ground arena. Play only when this unit would attack.

name: Rebel Defense Team
effect: Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of this unit's attack dice.)

name: Rebel Ground Crew Chief
effect: Tap -> Remove 1 damage counter from one of your Space units. Play only during your build step.

name: Refit on Yavin
effect: Remove all damage counters from one of your units in the Space or Ground arena. Put that unit face-down in your build zone with 3 build counters on it. Discard all cards stacked with it and its Pilot, if any.

name: Sabers Locked
effect: Pay 1 Force -> Choose one of your untapped Characters and one of your opponent's untapped Characters. Each player rolls one of his or her dice. If you roll lower, tap your Character. If your opponent rolls lower, tap his or her Character. If it's a tie, tap both Characters.

name: Sandtrooper Squad
effect:
Pay 3 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your units in the same arena as this unit, it now attacks this unit instead.)
Stun 2 (When this unit damages another unit, that unit gets -2 power until end of turn.)

name: Second Wave
effect: You may complete Second Wave only if you have no units in the Space arena and no Space units in your build zone. Put up to 3 Starfighter cards into the Space arena from your discard pile.

name: Star Destroyer
effect: Bombard 2 (This unit may attack a unit in the Ground arena instead of a unit in the Space arena, using 2 power plus any other effects.)

name: Stormtrooper Assault
effect: Pay 4 Force -> Choose Ground or Character. Each of your units in that arena gets +1 power until end of turn.

name: Stormtrooper Commander
effect: As long as this unit is in the Character arena, each of your other Stormtroopers gets +1 power.

name: Stormtrooper KE-829
effect:
This unit gets -2 power as long as it's attacking a unique Character.
Pay 2 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your Characters in the same arena as this unit, it now attacks this unit instead.)

name: Stormtrooper Platoon
effect: Pay 1 Force -> Retaliate 2 (If a unit in the same arena as this unit is attacking this unit, this unit does 2 dice of damage to that unit when the attack ends.)

name: Stormtrooper TK-875
effect: This unit gets -2 power as long as it's attacking a unique Character.

name: Tatooine Hangar
effect: As long as this unit is in the Ground arena, each of your Space units costs 1 fewer build counter to deploy.

name: TIE Fighter DS-29-4
effect: Stun 3 (When this unit damages another unit, that unit gets -3 power until end of turn.)

name: TIE Fighter DS-55-2
effect:
Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of this unit's attack dice.)
Pay 1 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your units in the same arena as this unit, it now attacks this unit instead.)
"It's a short-range fighter." _Obi-Wan Kenobi

name: Trust Your Feelings
effect: Predict the number of hits you'll roll for this attack (after any rerolls). If you're correct, you gain +3 Force. Play only before you roll attack dice.

name: Tusken Raider Squad
effect: Tap -> Choose an untapped Speeder. Tap that Speeder. Play only when this unit would attack.

name: Tusken War Party
effect: When this unit is discarded from the Ground arena, you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, return this card from your discard pile to your hand.

name: Untamed Ronto
effect: When this unit attacks, your opponent may pay 2 Force. If your opponent does, he or she chooses a unit (yours or your opponent's) in the same arena as the defending unit. This unit now attacks the chosen unit instead.

name: Vader's Fury
effect: Pay 6 Force -> Choose one of your Starfighters in the Space arena. Each time that Starfighter attacks this turn, when its attack ends, choose a unit in the Space arena that it can attack but hasn't attacked this turn. The Starfighter attacks that unit. Play only when no unit is attacking.

name: Visit to Mos Eisley
effect: Remove all damage counters from each of your damaged Ground units.

name: WED Treadwell
effect: Tap -> Remove up to 2 damage counters from one of your Droids. Play only during your build step.

name: Womp Rat
effect: When you deploy this unit, your opponent chooses and discards 1 card from his or her hand.

name: X-wing Red Squadron
effect: Accuracy 1 (Add +1 to each of this unit's attack dice.)

name: X-wing Squadron
effect:
Pay 3 Force -> Intercept (If a unit is attacking one of your units in the same arena as this unit, it now attacks this unit instead.)
Pay 2 Force -> Retaliate 2 (If a unit in the same arena as this unit is attacking this unit, this unit does 2 dice of damage to that unit when the attack ends.)

name: Y-wing Gold Two
effect:
Critical Hit 1
Pay 1 Force -> Retaliate 2 (If a unit in the same arena as this unit is attacking this unit, this unit does 2 dice of damage to that unit when the attack ends.)

name: Your Powers Are Weak
effect: Your opponent loses all of his or her Force.
